name: SEPARATION
description:
In a dark chamber, you wake alone. A door hisses open. Stepping outside, you find a barren landscape of rocks and dust, distant ruins in the pale morning sun. High above, on looming cliffs, a ruined temple stands abandoned, sealed. What lies within?

Her voice echoes in your mind, a whisper...

'It's been so long, since I had a visitor...'

The path is long forgotten, seldom trodden. Will you find the way?

Developed by solo indie game developer Recluse Industries, Separation is first person adventure at its most ambient and atmospheric. A meditation on solitude, loss, and the spiritual path, Separation is a unique journey to a place of epic desolation.

Featuring a sublime electronic soundtrack by Vector Lovers, Separation is the ultimate chill out trip.

Play-through time: around two hours.

1 player
400MB minimum save size
